entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:43AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND HIGHER SURF ALONG BRISTOL BAY AND KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST MONDAY... A unseasonably strong low is expected to track through the eastern Bering Sea Sunday night. Strong winds will develop as it moves towards the coastal areas along Bristol Bay and as far north as the Kuskokwim Delta after midnight through Monday morning.

entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:56PM EDT until July 23 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR CENTRAL WEBSTER COUNTY WILL EXPIRE AT 500 PM EDT... The storm which prompted the warning has weakened below severe limits, and no longer poses an immediate threat to life or property. Therefore, the warning will be allowed to expire.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Greenbrier County through 515 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Beartown State Park to Asbury. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail.

entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sweetwater County through 315 PM MDT...
